data.title: Ryan Funeral & Cremation Services
data.meta_description: Irondequoit - Passed away suddenly on October 31, 2021. He is predeceased by his parents John Hastings & Elizabeth Walleck and dogs Abby & Nitro. Survived by his wife Michele; b...
data.text:
Irondequoit - Passed away suddenly on October 31, 2021. He is predeceased by his parents John Hastings & Elizabeth Walleck and dogs Abby & Nitro. Survived by his wife Michele; brothers Timothy (James), John & James (Marge); step-father Paul Walleck; several nieces, nephews, uncles, and aunts; a large extended family and friends.

Brian was an avid dart player and a camping & outdoor enthusiast.

Calling hours will be held Friday 3-7 at Farrell-Ryan Funeral Home, 777 Long Pond Road. Funeral mass Saturday 9:30 at Sacred Heart Cathedral. Please wear sports attire (your favorite team jersey or shirt) in tribute to Brian's love for sports. To leave a message of condolence please visit www.Farrell-Ryan.com
